body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, attorney. Madison County native. Son of Andrew Broaddus and Grace Broaddus. Married to Ann B. Chambers Broaddus on August 8, 1861. Father of Joseph Broaddus. Student in Madison County in 1850. Household owned eleven enslaved persons in Madison County in 1850. Attended Georgetown College. Attorney in Madison County from 1858.
